name: Save Pompei!
description:
Escape from the volcanic eruption of Pompei, but not alone!
Introducing : Save Pompei!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Drag and drop poeple into the cart!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made in 2 days for a school project for... you guessed it, latin class. I think I did a pretty good job in 2 days and it's way more than enough for my little presentation. It was made in Construct 3, a online game engine that I think you should definetly check out!

Have fun ;)
